semantics.label: Text
semantics.description: Enter the text that contains words to be highlighted.

important.description:
• Mark parts of the text that students need to select with asterisks (*) before and after.
  • An asterisk can be added within highlighted words by adding a backward slash in front of it (\*).
  • Inside the asterisks, use two colons (::) and a highlight option name to set the expected highlight.
  • If you require two consecutive colons within highlighted words, write one of them with a backward slash in front of it (\::).
important.example: In this example, *this needs to be highlighted::yellow* by the student.

fields.label: Name
fields.description: Name used in the editor to set the highlight style required for part of your text.

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Label of this highlight style in the color legend

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Textual representation of color pickers
fields.description: Announce color description. @description is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective color's description.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the selections. The selections will be marked as correct or incorrect.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The solution will be displayed in addition to the selections.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all selections and start the task over again.

fields.label: Your result
fields.description: @score and @total are variables and will be replaced by their respective values.
